POC Podcasts in German

25 April 2020 - less than 1 min read time
Tags: Podcasts German

Sharing a list that was circulated in an Asian German activist group.

I’ve kept it to German ones.

Podcasts

  • diaspor.asia
  • rice & shine: Vietnamese-German
  • DonnaSori: Korean-German
  • Halbe Katoffl: Hybrid identities in Germany
  • bin ich süßsauer: Queer Asians
  • Heimatmysterium
  • Tupodcast: Focus on the Black community in Germany, on Anti-Racism.
  • Tanti Table - Hosted by Berlin-based womxn- Trinidadian-American writer Rhea Ramjohn, South African artist, Goitseone Montsho, and Afghan-German lawyer and writer Armeghan Taheri

Check out Bear Radio for more community podcasts in Berlin.

Youtubers

  • Karakaya talks: Muslim, queer
  • Datteltäter: Muslim community in Germany

For English ones, please check this megalist of Asian-Hosted podcasts

If you have others, feel free to ping me on Twitter!

with by Athena Lam
